titleStmt.title: The prompters packet of private and familar letters fitted (in sundrie formes) to mens seuerall occasions and according to the qualitie of persons. Not vnworthy imitation of the most: but most necessarie for such as want either facultie or facilitie to endight.

The prompters packet of private and familar letters fitted (in sundrie formes) to mens seuerall occasions and according to the qualitie of persons. Not vnworthy imitation of the most: but most necessarie for such as want either facultie or facilitie to endight.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Melchisedech Bradwood for Sa. Macham, and are to be sold at his shop in Pauls church-yard at the signe of the Bull-head,

notesStmt.note: Running title reads: A forme of writing letters.
Reproduction of the original in the Bodleian Library.
